snippet: Mr. Trump sowed doubts about the integrity of the democratic process on Sunday even as his own running mate assured voters the election would be legitimate....
abstract: Republican leaders as well as bipartisan body of election officials are working hard to publicly counter claims by Donald J Trump that election is rigged by media and Democratic Party against him; Trump's incendiary comments have many worried about impact on voter turnout and even possibility that his supporters could violently deny legitimacy election results should he lose.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and ALEXANDER BURNS

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump sowed doubts about the integrity of the democratic process on Sunday even as his own running mate assured voters the election would be legitimate.

headline.main: Officials Fight Donald Trump’s Claims of a Rigged Vote
headline.print_headline: Officials Fight Trump’s Claims of a Rigged Vote
